property.name: env.PRODUCT
property.value: Lamb/Hair/McDaniel, MKTG (with Online 1 term (6 months) Printed Access Card), 9th Edition

property.name: sun.java.command
property.value: org.codehaus.plexus.classworlds.launcher.Launcher clean test -Denv.CBURL=https://kt-login.cengage.com/cb/login.htm -Denv.OLRURL=http://kt-olradmin.cengage.com/olr/admin/indes.jsp -Denv.PRODUCT=Lamb/Hair/McDaniel, MKTG (with Online 1 term (6 months) Printed Access Card), 9th Edition
